doc:
Charlie Adler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlie_Adler 0 Charles Michael Adler (born October 2, 1956) is an American voice actor and voice director, best known for voicing Buster Bunny in Tiny Toon Adventures, Starscream in the Transformers film series, and Ickis in Aaahh!!! Real Monsters. He has voice directed numerous animated TV series including Rugrats, The Wild Thornberrys, Kung Fu Panda: The Paws of Destiny, Cow and Chicken, and I Am Weasel. Charles_Michael_Adler ( born October_2_,_1956 ) is an_American_voice_actor_and_voice_director , best_known for voicing Buster_Bunny in Tiny_Toon_Adventures , Starscream in the_Transformers_film_series , and Ickis in Aaahh !!! Real_Monsters . He has voice directed numerous_animated_TV_series_including_Rugrats , The_Wild_Thornberrys , Kung_Fu_Panda : The_Paws of Destiny_,_Cow_and_Chicken , and I Am Weasel .
